item.title: Exploring CollectionsMarshal for Dictionary
item.description: Unlike ConcurrentDictionary, Dictionary does not have a GetOrAdd method. This method is useful when you want to add a key-value pair to the dictionary if the key does not exist, or return the value if the key already exists. The naive implementation of this method looks like this: public static TValue GetOrAdd<TKey, TValue>(this Dictionary<TKey, TValue> dict, TKey key, TValue value) where TKey : notnull {â€¦ Link to article: https://www.meziantou.net/exploring-collectionsmarshal-for-dictionary.htm?utm_medium=social&utm_source=syndication
